fields.name: EMAS
fields.description: The EU Eco-Management and Audit Scheme (EMAS) is a premium management instrument developed by the European Commission for companies and other organisations to evaluate, report, and improve their environmental performance. EMAS is open to every type of organisation eager to improve its environmental performance. It spans all economic and service sectors and is applicable worldwide.

fields.name: B Corporations
fields.description: Certified B Corporations are a new kind of business that balances purpose and profit. They are legally required to consider the impact of their decisions on their workers, customers, suppliers, community, and the environment.

fields.name: CSR Europe
fields.description: CSR Europe is the European Business Network for Corporate Sustainability and Responsibility. We support businesses & industry sectors in their transformation.

fields.name: Shell
fields.description: Shell is a non-profit humanitarian organisation that is located in the UK and Netherlands that provides work in less developed countries.

fields.name: Tony's Chocolonely
fields.description: Tony's Chocolonely is a Dutch confectionery company founded in 2005 which produces and sells chocolate.

fields.name: Ben & Jerry's
fields.description: Ben & Jerry's Homemade Holdings Inc. trading and commonly known as Ben & Jerry's, is a Vermont-based company that manufactures ice cream and frozen yogurt.

fields.name: Patagonia
fields.description: Patagonia is a designer of outdoor clothing and gear for the silent sports: climbing, surfing, skiing and snowboarding, fly fishing, and trail running.

fields.name: Triodos
fields.description: Triodos is a sustainable bank with eye on the future.

fields.name: Greyston Bakery
fields.description: Greyston Bakery is a world-class commercial operation, producing 40,000 pounds of award-winning brownies daily for customers such as Ben & Jerry's and Whole Foods Market.

fields.name: Superwomen
fields.description: Project Superwomen was founded as a collaboration of a social service provider, a nonprofit employment-training center, and a non-profit shelter provider for female domestic violence victims.

fields.name: STARS Method
fields.description: STARS Method by Aashe

fields.name: newmethod2
fields.description: The method based on the YAML file Diederik shared

fields.description: This survey should be answered by all employees of the company

fields.description: This survey has to be filled in upon registration

fields.name: How many sustainability focused courses does your institute offer?
How many sustainability inclusive courses does your institute offer?
How many courses does your institute offer?
How many departments within your institute offer sustainability focused/inclusive courses?
What is the total number of departments within your institute?
How many graduates from degree programs require an understanding of sustainability?
What is the total number of graduates per year?

Does the institution conduct an assessment of sustainability culture, administered to the entire campus community (students and employees) directly or by representative sample (i.e., the assessment focuses on sustainability values, behaviors, and beliefs, and may also address awareness of campus sustainability initiatives)?

"Does the institution conduct an assessment of sustainability culture, administered to a subset of the campus community or a sample that may not be representative of the entire community (i.e., the assessment focuses on sustainability values, behaviors, and beliefs, and may also address awareness of campus sustainability initiatives)?"

Is the sustainability assessment administered longitudinally to measure change over time (i.e., with one or more follow-up assessments administered to the same cohort or representative samples of the same population).

How much floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space is certified at the highest achievable level under a multi-attribute GBC rating system for design and construction (e.g., LEED BD+C Platinum or Certified Living Building)?

"How much floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space is certified at the 2nd highest level under a 4- or 5-tier, multi-attribute GBC rating system for design and construction (e.g., LEED BD+C Gold) ?"

"How much floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space is certified at mid-level under a 3- or 5-tier, multi-attribute GBC rating system for design and construction (e.g., BREEAM Very Good)?"

"How much floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space is certified at a step above minimum level under a 4- or 5-tier, multi-attribute GBC rating system for design and construction (e.g., LEED BD+C Silver)?"
"How much floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space is certified at minimum level under a multi-attribute GBC rating system for design and construction (e.g., LEED BD+C Certified)?"

"How much floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space is certified/verified at any level under a multi-attribute, non-GBC rating system for design and construction, a green building code, or a single-attribute rating system for design and construction?"

"How much floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space is designed and built in accordance with a multi-attribute green building code, policy, guideline, or rating system, but not certified/verified ?"

"How much floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space is designed and built in accordance with a single-attribute green building code, policy, guideline, or rating system, but not certified/verified?"
What is the total floor area of newly constructed or renovated building space?
What is the annual energy consumption of your institute?
"How much electricity is imported electricity from certified/verified clean and renewable sources (i.e., bundled green power purchases)?"
How much electricity is electricity from on-site, clean and renewable sources?
How much thermal energy is generated from on-site clean and renewable stationary fuels?
"How much thermal energy is imported steam, hot water, and/or chilled water from certified/verified clean and renewable sources?"
"How much of your energy is purchased RECs, GOs, I-RECs or equivalent unbundled renewable energy products certified by a third party"

fields.formula: IF ([culture_sustainability_assessment_entire_campus] == "yes") AND ([culture_sustainability_assessment_longitudinally] == "yes") THEN [culture_sustainability_assessment_score] = 2*0.5ELSE IF ([culture_sustainability_assessment_entire_campus] == "yes" AND [culture_sustainability_assessment_longitudinally] == "no")THEN [culture_sustainability_assessment_score] = 0.5ELSE IF ([culture_sustainability_assessment_subset_campus] == "yes" AND [culture_sustainability_assessment_longitudinally] == "yes")THEN [culture_sustainability_assessment_score] = 2*0.25ELSE IF ([culture_sustainability_assessment_subset_campus] == "yes" AND [culture_sustainability_assessment_longitudinally] == "no")THEN [culture_sustainability_assessment_score] = 0.25
fields.name: Score of sustainability culture assessment
Score for designing and constructing the building
Electricity from on-site, clean and renewable sources in MMBtu
Purchased RECs, GOs, I-RECs or equivalent unbundled renewable energy products certified by a third part in MMBtu

Purchased RECs, GOs, I-RECs or equivalent unbundled renewable energy products certified by a third part score

fields.formula:
"IF ([total_score] >= 25) THEN [recognition_level]="Bronze" ELSE IF ([total_score] >= 45) THEN [recognition_level]="Silver"ELSE IF ([total_score] >= 65) THEN [recognition_level]="Gold"
ELSE IF ([total_score] >= 85) THEN [recognition_level]="Platinum"
ELSE [recognition_level]="Reporter""
fields.name: Recognition level
Total staff
fields.description: The total staff in terms of full time employees

fields.formula: IF([total_staff]<10) THEN [company_size]="micro" ELSE IF ([total_staff]<49) THEN [company_size]="small" ELSE IF([total_staff]<249) THEN [company_size]="medium" ELSE [company_size]="large
fields.name: Company size
fields.description: The size of the company based on the number of full time employees

fields.description: The gender pay gap

fields.name: Gender decision making ratio
fields.description: The gender decision making ratio

fields.formula: IF ([gender_ratio]<0.15) THEN ([gender_ratio_score]=0) ELSE IF ([gender_ratio]<0.85) THEN ([gender_ratio_score]=(10*[gender_ratio]-0.15) / (0.85-0.15)) ELSE ([gender_ratio_score] = 10)
fields.name: Gender ratio score
fields.description: The gender ratio score

fields.formula: IF ([company_type]="workers cooperative") THEN IF ([decision_making_ratio]<0.6) THEN ([decision_making_ratio_score]=0) ELSE ([decision_making_ratio_score]=10) ELSE IF ([decision_making_ratio]<0.3) THEN [decision_making_ratio_score]=0 ELSE [decision_making_ratio_score]=10
fields.name: Decision making ratio score
fields.description: Decision making ratio score

fields.name: Average employee satisfaction score
fields.description: Average employee satisfaction score

fields.formula: IF([company_size]="micro") OR ([company_size]="small") THEN [workplace_quality_score]=(0.3*[public_salaries_score] + 0.3*[decision_making_ratio_score] + 0.4*[average_employee_satisfaction_score]) ELSE IF ([company_size] ="medium") OR ([company_size] ="large") THEN [workplace_quality_score] = ((0.4*[public_salaries_score]) + (0.2 * [decision_making_ratio_score]) + (0.4 * [average_employee_satisfaction_score]))
fields.name: Workplace quality score
fields.description: Workplace quality score
